title: Before sleeping
author: GrePuG
preview: I have to admit that, I've been in really bad condition for months. And I know it is the time to end this.
content: <h1 id="before-sleeping">Before sleeping</h1><blockquote><p>I have to admit that, I&#39;ve been in really bad condition for months. And I know it is the time to end this.</p></blockquote><p>I have to admit that, I&#39;ve been in really bad condition for months. And I know it is the time to end this.</p><p>I love programming, and I know how far from a professional programmer for me. I learn this completely by myself. It is the personal interest that drive me to learn, to code. But I always know that I possibly won&#39;t go further in this field, due to the reality that I don&#39;t learn the basic of computer science and advanced mathematics. I basicly know nothing of them. I feel a sense of crisis.</p><h3 id="do-i-really-need-to-be-a-professional-programmer">Do I really need to be a Professional Programmer</h3><p>Well, my dream has never changed that I want to sart my own business. I am going to build my team, and act as a team member to finish our innovative inventions and put a dent in the universe.</p><p>It is the age of information technology. If you want to take a piece of the age, you are going to know about it. You want to know technology, you want to know how can use it to influence people in the way to live, to work, to entertain. And somehow make profits from it.</p><p>For me, as a founder of a start-up, do I have to be a professional programmer and decision maker? I am not sure about this.</p><h3 id="i-know-the-conclusion">I Know the Conclusion</h3><p>Just be as perfect as I can. A perfect founder won&#39;t miss an amazing company, as well as their products. So, decision must be make that I have to end this bad condition right now, so I can be more concentrated on the goal I pursuit.</p><h4 id="well-you-can-t-write-c-c-java-object-c-python-and-so-forth-but-you-can-write-javascript-so-just-stick-it-on">Well, you can&#39;t write C, C++, Java, Object-C, Python, and so forth, but You can write JavaScript, so Just Stick It On</h4>

title: Get Started!!!
author: GrePuG
preview: I have tried making a site using NodeJS for couple of days. And I finally realized that NodeJS is specialized for the web front-end developing, rather than serve as a web server. Anyway, it is still powerful on its speciality, and it's fun to have NodeJS in my toolbox.
content: <h1 id="get-started-">Get Started!!!</h1><p><a href="https://grepug.github.io">https://grepug.github.io</a></p><blockquote><p>I have tried making a site using NodeJS for couple of days. And I finally realized that NodeJS is specialized for the web front-end developing, rather than serve as a web server. Anyway, it is still powerful on its speciality, and it&#39;s fun to have NodeJS in my toolbox.</p></blockquote><h2 id="first-thing-first">First Thing First</h2><p>I have tried making a site using NodeJS for couple of days. And I finally realized that NodeJS is specialized for the web front-end developing, rather than serve as a web server. Anyway, it is still powerful on its speciality, and it&#39;s fun to have NodeJS in my toolbox.</p><h2 id="this-site-is-a-static-site">This Site is a Static Site</h2><p>That&#39;s to say no server side program is running when the site is visited. And this kind of site is just perfect for display static contents, for example, blog website....</p>
